events.message: I received the wrong item in my shipment and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
System categorized the customer issue as Refund based on message content mentioning refund request for incorrect item.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah for handling the refund request regarding the wrong item shipment.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m here to help you with your refund for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund promptly?
Sure, my order number is 789654123 and I’ve attached a photo showing the item is not what I ordered originally.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate how fast you are handling this issue and look forward to the refund.
The refund request has been successfully processed and the transaction is now closed. Please contact us if anything else arises.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks again for the great service and swift resolution.
The case has been closed following confirmation of refund receipt and customer satisfaction.
